Class MainActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
                      ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.activities.MainActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.FragmentManager.OnBackStackChangedListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements android.support.v4.app.FragmentManager.OnBackStackChangedListener

Inflates the default fragment and handles some of the crucial controller methods. Initializes most of our singleton classes so attempting to fetch an instance of one does not return null.

Author:
Artem Chikin, Henry Pabst, Artem Herasymchuk
